data.title: Treasures Of Oriental Museum at Durham University Official Shop
meta_keywords: Treasures Of Oriental Museum  at Durham University Official Shop
data.meta_description:
This beautifully illustrated book presents 50 highlights from the collections of Durham University's Oriental Museum.
Edited by the Museum's curators, and packed with more than 100 stunning photographs, the book features an introduction tracing the history of the Museum's collections and their arrival in Durham. This is followed by 50 short essays written by artists, curators, researchers, students and collectors from the UK and around the world.
Each essay offers a different view on an object from this enormously varied and fascinating collection, accompanied by all new colour photography of these stunning objects.
Did you know that we offer free delivery to all Colleges, Departments and Visitor Attractions across the University? Just choose from the drop down menu at the checkout!
data.text:
Â£15.00

This beautifully illustrated book presents 50 highlights from the collections of Durham University's Oriental Museum.

Edited by the Museum's curators, and packed with more than 100 stunning photographs, the book features an introduction tracing the history of the Museum's collections and their arrival in Durham. This is followed by 50 short essays written by artists, curators, researchers, students and collectors from the UK and around the world.

Each essay offers a different view on an object from this enormously varied and fascinating collection, accompanied by all new colour photography of these stunning objects.
